revision.text: ====EV Damage Multipler==== EVs benefit the Player by increasing the amount of damage that a Pokémon does. EVs multiply damage done by up to 2x. If your EV is below 50, you gain 1% extra damage per EV. I.E. with 5 Effort Value, you have a 1.05x damage multiplier for that Pokémon. {| class="wikitable" ! Effort Value || Pokémon Damage Multiplier |- | 50 || 1.5x |- | 85 || 1.6x |- | 172 || 1.7x |- | 375 || 1.8x |- | 824 || 1.9x |- | 1770 || 2x |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
